name: Cygnus (NODEM design)
description:
Challenge yourself to slash all the enemies on the arena.

Test your skill in the limited gameplay area with high paced combat.

Find the enemies, avoid attack, kill the enemies, and get the scores.

This is a final project created to finish study in Siliwangi University.

Inspired by VoYD by Nat Pash Design (itch.io)
